alert.note: Alert for Mahoning; Portage; Summit; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 19 at 6:51AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...An intense band of snow showers will affect Portage...Trumbull... Mahoning and Summit Counties Until 745 AM EST.... At 648 AM EST, radar indicated an intense area of snow showers along a line extending from Atlantic to Warren to 6 miles east of Mogadore, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Winds to 40 mph... Visibility rapidly dropping to less than a quarter of a mile... Locations impacted include... Akron, Youngstown, Warren, Ravenna, Cuyahoga Falls, Boardman, Kent, Barberton, Green, Hudson, Niles, Twinsburg, Tallmadge, Streetsboro, Macedonia, Campbell, Hubbard, Canfield, Cortland and Newton Falls. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through these snow showers. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Some interstates that will be impacted include I-80 and I-76. Consider delaying travel until this snow band passes your location. && ODOT DMS 305, 325, 327, 603, 606, 607, 611, 612, 613, 614, 615, 616, 617, 604, 605, 619, and 620.
